stages.name: Under Review
stages.description: Application being reviewed by hiring manager

stages.name: Phone Screen
stages.description: Initial phone/video screening scheduled or completed

stages.name: Hired
stages.description: Candidate accepted, move to onboarding pipeline

stages.name: Unsuccessful
stages.description: Candidate not selected — rejection email sent automatically

stages.name: Talent Pool
stages.description: Good candidate, no current fit — keep for future roles

automations.name: New Application — Acknowledge & Notify
actions: Send email to candidate: 'Thank you for applying to {job_applied_for} at DDWL. Your application reference is {application_ref}. We review every application and will be in touch within 48 hours.'
Send internal notification to admin@dodealswithlee.com: 'New application received for {job_applied_for} from {first_name} {last_name}'
Add to Recruitment Pipeline → New Application stage
Create task: 'Review application from {first_name} {last_name}' assigned to Lilly, due in 24 hours

automations.name: Under Review — Update Candidate
automations.trigger: Pipeline stage moved to: Under Review
actions: Send email to candidate: 'Hi {first_name}, your application for {job_applied_for} is now being reviewed by our team. We appreciate your patience.'
Add tag: under-review
Remove tag: new-application

automations.name: Phone Screen Scheduled
automations.trigger: Pipeline stage moved to: Phone Screen
actions: Send email to candidate: 'Hi {first_name}, we'd like to schedule a phone screen with you for the {job_applied_for} role. Please use the link below to book a time that works for you: [CALENDAR_LINK]'
Add tag: phone-screen-scheduled
Remove tag: under-review

automations.name: Interview Scheduled — Notify Admins
automations.trigger: Pipeline stage moved to: Interview Scheduled
actions: Send email to candidate: 'Hi {first_name}, your interview for {job_applied_for} has been confirmed. Details: [DATE/TIME]. We look forward to meeting you!'
Send email to krystle.gordon@dodealswithlee.com: 'Interview scheduled: {first_name} {last_name} for {job_applied_for}'
Add tag: interview-scheduled
Remove tag: phone-screen-scheduled

automations.name: Offer Extended — Notify Lee & Krystle
automations.trigger: Pipeline stage moved to: Offer Extended
actions: Send email to candidate: 'Hi {first_name}, congratulations! We'd like to extend an offer for the {job_applied_for} position. Please check your email for the full details.'
Send email to lee.kearney@dodealswithlee.com: 'Offer extended to {first_name} {last_name} for {job_applied_for}'
Send email to krystle.gordon@dodealswithlee.com: 'Offer extended to {first_name} {last_name} for {job_applied_for}'
Add tag: offer-extended

automations.name: Hired — Trigger Onboarding
actions: Send email to candidate: 'Welcome to the team, {first_name}! We're thrilled to have you join DDWL. You'll receive onboarding instructions shortly.'
Send email to lee.kearney@dodealswithlee.com: 'NEW HIRE: {first_name} {last_name} has accepted the {job_applied_for} position'
Send email to krystle.gordon@dodealswithlee.com: 'NEW HIRE: {first_name} {last_name} — please begin onboarding setup'
Send email to daniel@exposuresolutions.me: 'NEW HIRE: {first_name} {last_name} — tech setup required (G-Suite, GHL, Windsurf, etc.)'
Add to Onboarding Pipeline → Day 1 Setup stage
Add tag: hired
Remove tags: offer-extended, interview-scheduled

automations.name: Unsuccessful — Send Rejection (ALWAYS)
actions: Wait 2 hours (avoid instant rejection feel)

Send email to candidate: 'Hi {first_name}, thank you for taking the time to apply for {job_applied_for} at DDWL. After careful consideration, we've decided to move forward with other candidates at this time. We were impressed by your application and encourage you to apply for future openings. We wish you all the best in your career. — The DDWL Team'
Set field: rejection_email_sent = true
Add tag: rejection-sent
Add tag: unsuccessful
Remove all other recruitment stage tags

automations.name: Talent Pool — Keep Warm
automations.trigger: Pipeline stage moved to: Talent Pool
actions: Send email to candidate: 'Hi {first_name}, while we don't have a perfect match right now, we were really impressed by your profile. We've added you to our talent pool and will reach out when a suitable role opens up. Stay in touch!'
Add tag: talent-pool
Create task: 'Re-engage {first_name} {last_name} from talent pool' due in 90 days

automations.name: Stale Application Check (7 days)
automations.trigger: Time-based: 7 days after entering New Application stage with no movement
actions: Send internal notification to admin@dodealswithlee.com: 'REMINDER: Application from {first_name} {last_name} for {job_applied_for} has been sitting for 7 days with no action'
Create task: 'Review stale application: {first_name} {last_name}' assigned to Lilly, due in 24 hours

automations.name: No Response Follow-Up (3 days after email)
automations.trigger: 3 days after candidate email sent with no reply
actions: Send follow-up email to candidate: 'Hi {first_name}, just checking in regarding your application for {job_applied_for}. If you have any questions, feel free to reply to this email. We'd love to hear from you!'
Create task: 'Follow up with {first_name} {last_name} — no response' assigned to Lilly

applicationReceived.subject: Application Received — {{job_applied_for}} at DDWL
applicationReceived.body:
Hi {{first_name}},

Thank you for applying for the {{job_applied_for}} position at Do Deals With Lee.

Your application reference is: {{application_ref}}

We review every application personally and you'll hear from us within 48 hours.

In the meantime, learn more about us at https://dodealswithlee.com

Best regards,
The DDWL Team

interviewInvite.subject: Interview Invitation — {{job_applied_for}} at DDWL
interviewInvite.body:
Hi {{first_name}},

Great news! We'd like to invite you for an interview for the {{job_applied_for}} position.

Please use the link below to book a time that works for you:
[CALENDAR_LINK]

The interview will be approximately 30 minutes and will be conducted via video call.

Looking forward to meeting you!

Best regards,
The DDWL Team

offerLetter.subject: Job Offer — {{job_applied_for}} at DDWL
offerLetter.body:
Hi {{first_name}},

We're delighted to offer you the position of {{job_applied_for}} at Do Deals With Lee!

Please find the details of your offer below:
- Position: {{job_applied_for}}
- Start Date: {{earliest_start_date}}
- Salary: {{offered_salary}}

Please reply to confirm your acceptance or if you have any questions.

Welcome aboard!

Best regards,
Lee Kearney
CEO, Do Deals With Lee

rejection.subject: Update on Your Application — DDWL
rejection.body:
Hi {{first_name}},

Thank you for taking the time to apply for the {{job_applied_for}} position at Do Deals With Lee.

After careful consideration, we've decided to move forward with other candidates at this time.

This was not an easy decision — we were genuinely impressed by your application. We encourage you to apply for future openings as they become available.

We wish you all the best in your career.

Warm regards,
The DDWL Team

talentPool.subject: You're in Our Talent Pool — DDWL
talentPool.body:
Hi {{first_name}},

While we don't have a perfect match for you right now, we were really impressed by your profile and experience.

We've added you to our talent pool and will reach out when a suitable role opens up. In the meantime, feel free to keep an eye on our careers page.

Stay in touch!

Best regards,
The DDWL Team
